stories.title: Living at Geisel Priso- I mean Library
If everyone is doing it, is it really illegal?
stories.story: I don't wanna say much and risk embarassment or arrest, but sh*t was craaaaazy. Well, I suppose this site is anonymous. Still not risking it. But if you guys every get the chance, GO.

stories.title: Museums everywhere
stories.story: I had a great time here. The beautiful architecture coupled with San Diego's great weather resulted in an awesome experience for me. Despite the cool history exhibits, pretty foliage, and sleek statues, I would have to say I was most impressed by the fish. They were really big.
